Package common.exceptions

package with different kinds of common.exceptions

See: Description

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    CannotCreateFileException
    thrown when unable to create file
    ClosedConnectionException
    thrown when connection is closed
    CommandException
    base class for all exceptions caused by executing commands
    ConnectionException
    base class for all connection exceptions caused by connection problems
    ConnectionTimeoutException
    thrown when waiting timout exceed
    EmptyCollectionException
    thrown when collection is empty
    EmptyPathException
    thrown when file path is empty
    EmptyStringException
    thrown when user input is empty
    ExitException
    thrown when program is interrupted
    FileException
    base class for all file exceptions
    FileNotExistsException
    thrown when file doesnt exist
    FileWrongPermissionsException
    thrown when not enough permission to access the file
    InvalidAddressException
    thrown when address is invalid
    InvalidCommandArgumentException
    thrown when command argument is invalid
    InvalidDataException
    base class for exceptions caused by invalid data
    InvalidDateFormatException
    thrown when date format is invalid
    InvalidEnumException
    thrown when input doesnt match enum
    InvalidNumberException
    thrown when number is incorrect
    InvalidPortException
    thrown when port is invalid
    InvalidProgramArgumentsException
    thrown when arguments passed by command line are invalid
    InvalidReceivedDataException
    thrown when received data is invalid
    MissedCommandArgumentException
    thrown when user doesn't enter required command argument
    NoSuchCommandException
    thrown when user enters invalid command
    PortAlreadyInUseException
    thrown when port already in use
    RecursiveScriptExecuteException
    thrown when script call loops

Package common.exceptions Description

package with different kinds of common.exceptions
See Also:
InvalidDataException, CommandException, FileException
